body:
Sentence completion questions are fill-in-the-blank questions that are great for screening the candidates. The system can automatically grade these questions and require no human effort for evaluation. A candidate is given a piece of text with missing words or phrases and must type in the missing pieces correctly. You can use this to test both non-technical and technical knowledge.

Refer to the following topics for more information:

  1. Creating a Sentence Completion Question
  2. Scoring a Sentence Completion Question
title: Sentence Completion Questions
